Using the Library

All the detail from the tutor on how to plan, find good information, and then use it was a lot to take in, so I followed the part of her advice on talking to someone in the library

Ann in the library helped me understand how to find the information I needed, especially using research databases, and more importantly how best to approach my assignment research

I took a class on referencing in the library that really helped me get my head around this concept, which seems very important
